trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_000_000<tab>A fellow Eorzean, am I right? Do you fancy yourself much of a sightseer?
TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_000_001<tab>Dear old Millith gave you her journal? My, what a small world. It just so happens that I'm her cousin! Elsebee Ironheart at your service.

TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_000_002<tab>Well, if you've met Cousin Millith, I'm sure you can guess why I “crossed the salt,” as they say. This continent is positively brimming with sights unseen by Eorzean eyes, and I'm here to discover them all!

TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_000_003<tab>My twin sister and I, that is. You see, I had more interest in Yok, while she was drawn to the vistas of Xak. So it was that we parted ways at the bridge, each of us touring half of Tural.
TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_000_004<tab>...So give me your sightseeing log, then!
TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_000_005<tab>Let's see, let's see... Oh, how beautiful! I should like to see these places myself someday. Ahem, er, sorry, I was going to just scribble down...
TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_000_006<tab>...my notes on Yok Tural! I included what my sister shared with me of Xak Tural, but I'm afraid it isn't much.

TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_000_007<tab>My twin's name is Emeline and she's still wandering about over there. Given your natural affinity for Ironhearts, you'll doubtless run into her someday.
TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_000_008<tab>Well, I'm sure you've got places to be and vistas to behold. May your journey throughout Tural be bright and unforgettable!
TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>Dawntrail entries have been added to your sightseeing log!

TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You must be level 90 or above to record Dawntrail vistas. Travel to the location indicated and fulfill the necessary conditions and you will complete the entry for that vista, earning experience points in the process.

TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Use your wits and the notes provided by Elsebee to identify these stunning sights and the proper way to appreciate them, and see Tural as only the greatest explorers have seen her!
TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_ELSEBEEIRONHEART_100_020<tab>Eager to behold Tural's myriad wonders, are you? Come and find me once you're a bit more experienced.
TEXT_KINGYR104_05006_SYSTEM_100_021<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be level 90 or above.
